segments.text: I see the woman facing away, drying her plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is a waterfall of trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours steadily, no one stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her unawareness makes me worry for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's adventure with the stool is risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy stretches so far; one wrong move and down he goes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waits below, trusting him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar fullâ€”temptation for little ones.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle grows, threatening slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open wide, inviting the mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden peaceful, inside on the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all stay safe in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how quickly things can go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domestic scene tugs at my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR
